description: Obtains the permissions boundary for a specified  PermissionSet.

parameters.name: InstanceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the IAM Identity Center instance under which the operation will be executed.

nested_items.name: PermissionsBoundary
nested_items.description: The permissions boundary attached to the specified permission set.

nested_items.name: CustomerManagedPolicyReference
nested_items.description: Specifies the name and path of a customer managed policy. You must have an IAM policy that matches the name and path in each Amazon Web Services account where you want to deploy your permission set.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the IAM policy that you have configured in each account where you want to deploy your permission set.

nested_items.name: Path
nested_items.description: The path to the IAM policy that you have configured in each account where you want to deploy your permission set. The default is /. For more information, see Friendly names and paths in the IAM User Guide.

nested_items.name: ManagedPolicyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services managed policy ARN that you want to attach to a permission set as a permissions boundary.
